summary: WHEN DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE IN A HEAVY DOWNPOUR OF RAIN, THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS FAILED.  I ALMOST GOT  INTO AN ACCIDENT WHEN TRYING TO PULL OFF THE HIGHWAY.  THE WIPERS WILL SWIPE WHEN MANUALLY MOVED.  I BELIEVE THAT THE ARM HAS BECOME DISCONNECTED FROM THE MOTOR.      I'VE SEEN A LOT OF COMPLAINTS ABOUT THE WIPERS.  IT SEEMS THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL ISSUED.
